result.execSummary:
The defendant Ronald M. Carstensen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Misconduct/Office-Act/Inconsistent Duty, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.12(3).
  • Theft-Business Setting <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Pay court costs.   Payment is due within 30 days.  If the Defendant cannot make the payment, he/she must report to the Clerk of Courts Office to set up a payment plan.  Failure to comply will result in other collection methods including a civil Judgment and/or suspension of your drivers license for two (2) years.  This judgment may be collected by income assignment if you fail to pay fines and costs as ordered.
--------------------------------

to the Walworth County Jail with Huber privileges to commence onor before October 1, 2015 at 8:00 a.m.   IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT the defendant's excess Huber funds be applied toward any and all outstanding restitution, fines/costs while serving his/her mandatory jail sentence.
--------------------------------

Pay Sheriff fees in the amount of $1,440.00.
----------------------------

Complete forty (40) hours of community service work by March 17, 2016. If Community Service Work in not completed, the Defendant will need to serve 40 days in Jail with Huber privileges.
---------------------------------

Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s)/witnesses/co-actors  listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  NO CONTACT WITH LAKE GENEVA STREET DEPARTMENT OFFICE OR GROUNDS, DONALD HOEFT, DENNIS JORDAN, DANIEL WINKLER, PEG POLITT, JENNIFER SPECIAL, DUANE BAERBOCK, DANIEL SOJKA, ROBERT CASTLEMAN, LYNN ALLEN, OR SABRINA WASWO OR WITH ANY OF THEIR RESIDENCES OR PLACES OF EMPLOYMENT.
